description.zh: Kimai 是一个专业级的免费开源时间追踪应用，适用于自由职业者和各类企业用户。它帮助用户高效记录项目时间，并提供多种高级功能。基于现代技术构建，支持多用户环境，包含开票、报表、集成等功能。
description.en: Kimai is a professional-grade, free, and open-source time-tracking application designed for freelancers and companies of all sizes. It allows users to efficiently track project times and offers a wide range of advanced features. Built with modern technologies, it supports multi-user environments with features like invoicing, reporting, and integrations.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 适用于自由职业者和大型企业，具备良好的可扩展性
- 开源项目，拥有活跃的社区和插件生态
- 使用现代、安全且易于维护的技术栈构建

## 功能列表:

- 支持多计时器和打卡上下班的时间追踪功能
- 支持开票、数据导出和高级报表
- 提供用于集成的 JSON API
- 多用户支持，包括时区、多语言和基于角色的权限管理
- 支持通过 SAML 和 LDAP 认证及双因素身份验证（2FA）
- 标签功能、高级搜索与过滤、可自定义的项目费率
- 插件支持及插件市场以扩展功能
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Designed for both freelancers and large organizations with advanced scalability
- Open-source with strong community and plugin ecosystem
- Built with modern, secure, and maintainable technology stack

## Features:

- Time tracking with multi-timer and punch-in/punch-out mode
- Invoicing, data exports, and advanced reporting
- JSON API for integrations and third-party tools
- Multi-user support with timezones, languages, and role-based permissions
- Authentication via SAML, LDAP, and two-factor authentication (2FA)
- Tagging, advanced search & filtering, and customizable project rates
- Plugin support and marketplace for extending functionality
